channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The US academic partnership with China, under strain for years, faces its biggest threat
item.description: Frayed by tariff wars and political battles, the academic tie between the U.S. and China is now facing its greatest threat yet as the Trump administration promises to revoke visas for an unknown number of Chinese students and tighten future visa screening.

item.title: Faizan Zaki overcomes a shocking, self-inflicted flub and wins the Scripps National Spelling Bee
Trump administration increases pressure on ‘sanctuary jurisdictions’ with public listing
